Miracle of Mary: The infidel who stole the lumber from the church at Dabra Qʷǝsqʷām

Miracle of Mary: ʾƎnṭāwos, a pagan from Qarāys, becomes a Christian after being struck by miraculous arrows
Miracle of Mary: A man who speaks blasphemously of St Mary has his hands and legs cut off

Miracle of Mary: Miracle of a fisherman who was washing his clothes and the reversed river
Miracle of Mary: Miracle of a man washing clothes and the reversed river
Miracle of Mary: Miracle of a fisherman who adored the Virgin Mary and was saved from snake
Miracle of young Jesus and catechist
Miracle of Mary: A priest is warned by an angel not to rush when incensing the icon of St Mary
Miracle of Mary: St Mary blesses Scete, which St Macarius choses for his monastery
Miracle of Mary: The story of Michael, the scribe who converted to Islam when he was beaten
Miracle of Mary: The story of the Muslim who lived near the churches of St Mark and St Shenute

Miracle of Mary: The miracle concerning the golden ink during the time of king Dāwit
